DOC.brief_title: Clinical Significance 64-slice Multidetector Coronary CT Angiography Evaluate Prevalence Severity Coronary Artery Disease Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: 1. age ≥ 40 yr 2. renal transplant recipient posttransplant 6 12 month 3. stable graft renal function : CKDEPI ( Chronic Kidney Disease Epidemiology Collaboration ) equation ≥45 mL/min/1.75m2 4. patient previous CAD 1. unstable graft renal function 2 . History acute kidney injury within 3 month 3 . Allergic history contrast agent 4 . Irregular heart beat 5 . Multiorgan transplant recipient 6 . Pregnancy 7 . Patients consent study
